ai-ja293:1.1_0: “I am victim of a sickening disease
ai-ja293:1.2_0: Bāhiya of the Rohiṇī was covered with dawn,
ai-ja293:1.4_0: Just as a lotus flower shrubsors down
ai-ja293:2.3_0: full of flocks of various corpses full.
ai-ja293:2.4_0: you like someone who sees from discerning.
ai-ja293:3.1_0: let the curse this very night,
ai-ja293:3.2_0: to be disgusted, and not liable to sickness,
ai-ja293:3.3_0: But in which these things are cut off,
ai-ja293:3.4_0: who make the path to rebirth in the next life.”
